Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Iinkosi zabantu bakwaFir’awn zathi: “Inene lo, yingcungela yomenzi wemilingo
Yena ufuna ukunikhupha ezweni lenu, nicebisa ntoni na ke nina ngaye?”
Bathi bona: “Mbekeni yena nomntakwabo bucala (okwethutyana), nithumele izigidimi ezixekweni ukuba ziqokelele
Zize nazo zonke iingcaphephe zokwenza imilingo
Bafika ke abenzi bemilingo kuFir’awn bathi: “Inene siya kuba nomvuzo omhle na ukuba sibe ngaboyisileyo?”
Wathi yena (uFir’awn): “Ewe nje, ngapha koko nina niya kuba ngabasondeleyo kum (ngokwesikhundla).”
Bathi bona: “Hini na Mûsâ! Ingaba nguwe okanye sithi na abaza kuqala bajule?”
Wathi yena: “Julani (kuqala).” Bajula ke, bawathakatha amehlo abantu, bafaka uloyiko kubo, babonisa umlingo omkhulu (apho)
Ke Thina Satyhila kuMûsâ (okokuba): “Jula eyakho intonga.” Khangela! Yabuginya ngoko nangoko bonke ubuxoki ababebubonisa (apho)
Ngaloo ndlela yaba ke inyaniso iyangqineleka, kwaza konke oko babekwenzile akwabi nto yanto
Ke kaloku baba ngaboyisiweyo, bemka apho behlazekile
UFir’awn wathi: “Nikholwe kuye ndinganinikanga mvume kusini na? Inene le, eli liqhinga eniliqulunqileyo esixekweni ukuze nikhuphe abantu baso (kuso), kodwa niza kwazi kungekudala
Inene mna ndiya kuninqumla izandla zenu neenyawo ngokuphikisana kwamacala (isandla sokunene nonyawo lokhohlo), ndize ndinibethelele emnqamlezweni nonke.”
Bathi bona: “Inene thina siya kubuyela eNkosini yethu.”
Wena (Fir’awn) uyaziphindezela kuthi ngenxa yokuba sikholiwe kwimiqondiso yeNkosi yethu ethe yafika kuthi! Nkosi yethu thulula phezu kwethu ukunyamezela, usenze kananjalo sife singamaMuslim.”
